item.title: About
item.description: Avian: The First Behavior-Oriented Programming Language Hello an welcome to Avian, the first programming language created for the Behavior-Oriented Programming (BOP) paradigm. Avian was made with the pillars of BOP in mind: Explicitness over implicitness Appointment Inheritence Polymorphism The rest of this page will be done in the near future. Please be patient during this time :)
